QuestData.Title: Waptor Twapping
QuestData.Description: Waptor twapping can be wough, but I've designed new waptor twaps that ewiminate much of the wisk.$B$BSet the twap on the gwound and it will scweech wike a waptor, luwing one into the twap.$B$BWhen a waptor steps on my waptor twap, it'll shwink down so that it's wess dangewous. It's wewwy easy! I would do it myself but wecentwy I wan acwoss King Weapercwaw.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Kala'ma's "Waptor Twap" to capture 5 Wittle Waptors.
QuestData.RewardText: Hooway! You twapped the waptors I was wooking for! Now we will twain them for twolls to wide to swaughter the Awwiance!
